website_summaries.verdict: Canary is packed with solid hardware, but it doesn't add up to a device we'd want to depend on.
pros: Canary offers impressive video quality including a highly detailed night vision mode
Its "Homehealth" sensors are accurate and helpful
cons: An over-sensitive motion sensor renders Canary borderline unusable, and we didn't receive text alerts when we cut the power

customer_reviews.title: Horrible company. Wish I could return mine
customer_reviews.text: As of October 2017 Canary has removed free security features. You can no longer download videos, record events over 10 seconds, have a night mode, or record events while in home mode making the systems pointless. You can have these feautires back if you buy the monthly subscription. Horrible company. Wish I could return mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Luck

customer_reviews.title: Cheated by recent changes to their plans...
customer_reviews.text: Recent (Oct ‘17) unilateral, forced new usage terms made this a bad option for home security. Personally, I feel cheated by the company: I bought this instead of the competition because the free plan was enough for my needs. Now the free plan is useless, and I won’t fork over ten bucks per month for a lot of things I don’t need. Shame on Canary, I’ll never buy any device from them, again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Marques

customer_reviews.title: Was a great product up until the last update
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product up until the last update, for all of the reasons others have already mentioned. They literally took away all of the features that made it work and now make you pay monthly for them. I also don't receive any notifications at all any more, its literally worthless now. So disappointing. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: "Thanks for the $200. It's now $100/yr extra to keep the features you thought you'd paid for."
customer_reviews.text: The main reason we bought into Canary was to have it monitor our home while we're asleep. This, which was advertised as a free feature when we bought it three months ago, now requires a $100/year plan. If you buy this, expect them to remove features you though you'd already paid for in order to force you into their subscription plan.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kuyk-White

customer_reviews.title: Recent update ruins a great product.
customer_reviews.text: 5-Star review down to a 1-Star. This product used to be awesome. Worked exactly as intended and offered great features for no monthly fee. With the latest update it's basically worthless. Just look at all of the recent 1-star reviews. They just lost a mass amount of customers.
customer_reviews.author: Remus P.

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect and I always was advising friends of mines to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect and I always was advising friends of mines to purchase one... until Canary updated non-membership features. They even removed option watch LIVE if one of the members is home. We used to use it to watch our baby while being on patio... now you have to pay for it. I bought a $200 piece because of the futures it offered, but now the company took them away. Canary, now, offers very little for non-members to compare with other products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: not good....
customer_reviews.text: awful customer service, they changed their policy and now you have to pay for features that were free. I would never have bought it, not worth it and it goes offline all the time.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution, easy to use. I bought the outdoor one too!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this system. It's easy to install and the video quality is great. I purchased the outdoor FLEX too and can't wait to install them. Our internet is a little slow so the feed is delayed a few seconds. I feel like app has some bugs it needs to work out too, but I'm really happy with it overall. It's main function has been to let me know how frequently the dogs wander around the house or get on the sofa, but hey, I hope I never have to use it for the reason it was intended!
customer_reviews.author: Spenceredwinm

customer_reviews.title: Reliable camera
customer_reviews.text: Always reliable and clear. Connects easily. Support easily contacted. Very happy with this security camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: A few months after doing a bunch of researching and settling on the Canary camera they raised their prices and made functionality that used to be free $9.99/mo. After being burned by this bait and switch I'll never trust Canary again.
customer_reviews.author: Wheat Thicks

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviewers we are disappointed with the new paywall ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought our Canary about a year and a half ago based on the reasonable costs. Like other reviewers we are disappointed with the new paywall and agree it is a bait and switch. We were thinking of adding to the Canary system. Now we are looking at other systems.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love my canary! First off, I'm a police officer in Florida and this device or something similar inside a home is the number one most important thing to catch a burglar. I have told countless individuals and victims about this product and seen it used many times. Second, I love all the features of the device and being able to check up on anyone that's in my house for any reason. Night vision works well and ive never had any bad experience about useless motion notifications. Then again, my house has no pets.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: which provides better and more worthwhile security features
customer_reviews.text: It was okay for the a year and then most features were disallowed. It's a hook and then if you do not subscribe to a $20/mo. service it just becomes a real-time camera that you must monitor constantly. Consequently, I contracted with a local security company for $25/mo. which provides better and more worthwhile security features. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Ronalda Carlson

customer_reviews.title: thanks for the good product
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few other brand cameras first and returned them. My canary works great, looks nice and is inconspicuous, an occasional false alarm from sunlight shining directly on it but that hasn't happened since I changed sensitivity setting, its just set and forget it, It turns on and off when we leave or return back to the house with the auto setting, when I set camera up originally I missed a step and support was easy to get and they worked with me a long time to fix my mistake keep up the good work Canary
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Want peace of mind while sleeping? It will cost you.
customer_reviews.text: I would return this if I could, but it's been too long. Canary updated their free subscription offering so basic features like recording video at night while you are home will now cost $10 per month. I shouldn't have to pay for peace of mind while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: initially it was great, i bought two of them because canary provided 24hours of free recording. now after purchasing they changed the free 24 hour recording to limited 10 second previews with limited live viewing. now its useless for what i need it for... unless you pay for the membership. the one feature (free 24 hour) recording is why i originally bought this product, now if i have to pay a membership i'll look at nest.
customer_reviews.author: tp

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed! It would be important for Canary to tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Membership seems to be required. The Canary goes off for all of our ceiling fans! The doors are locked, and the home is secured, However, we get notifications every 10 minutes or more! Just tell everyone who purchases this item that they have to buy a membership. So disappointed! It would be important for Canary to tell this to their customers. Hopefully, they will be able improve this product. It looked good, but it just wasn't. I wanted this to be my home security system, but it's not! Look around! Not sure about what one should choose. Not actually bait and switch, but buy the membership or what? Don't know! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: These were great, but they've changed features that were previously free
customer_reviews.text: These were great, but they've changed features that were previously free, taking away a lot of its use. Previously this would record video and hold for 24 hours no matter if you were home or not. Now the Canary doesn't record if you're home. Taking away previously free features is terrible customer service and a borderline predatory practice. I've had it for slightly over a year so I'm not able to get a refund at this point, or I'd just send it back and pick a new one. Now I'm stuck with a device that does half as much as it used to.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Stick em up!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase Canary cameras! Bait and switch! I now have $500 worth of useless paperweights. Proffessional criminals have nothing on these doofus crooks... at least bank robbers say “stick em up”!
customer_reviews.author: saintd

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I expected and more.
customer_reviews.text: Canary does everything I expected and more. At first Canary notified me each day when my robot vacuum cleaner did its work and with a little adjustment that issue was taken care of. The image that Canary provides me on my devices are clear both day and night. I find satisfaction looking at an image of my home and seeing that the environment, including air quality, is all good. It is comforting to know that with a touch of a button I can call the authorities and/or sound Canary's piercing siren. I highly recommend Canary to everyone who wants a high tech and useful device at a very reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Company, Don’t Trust Them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for $200 because it came with access to recorded videos without having to pay a subscription fee. Now 3 year’s later, it’s a useless device that basically only acts as a live camera feed. It’s so bad at picking up movement and it barely records any videos. And even if it did record a video I only have access to 10 seconds of it without a subscription. They complete stole my money. I paid $200 for specific features that they just took away. Now this camera is only $50 because they want you to buy a subscription. What happened to my $150 in features Canary?
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It was great! The app is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Canary. It was great! The app is terrible. When I first bought it, movement alerts when I wasn't home would get sent to my phone and I would have 24 hours to replay it. Well they changed that. Your alerts now stop at the detected movement and the only way to see it is subscribe $4.99 a month. If I could return this I would. Very shady business practices. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stockerger

customer_reviews.title: Has many things going for it, but the monthly fee kills it for me.
customer_reviews.text: Image and hardware is good, as well as the software. I had a DVR and another system prior before this, and I miss the ability to mount the hardware someone else besides on a table. Nor can I host my own video with monthly fees. If you are okay with the fees, I think it's a great product for 80 % of the end consumer market. Pros: Info on air quality Geo fencing Great user interface EZ setup Cons: Monthly fees No audio Placement - meant to be sitting on top of a table or counter
customer_reviews.author: customphotoshoot

customer_reviews.title: looks really good and non threatening (update shiny piece of crap)
customer_reviews.text: Set up was not too difficult, looks really good and non threatening. I wish they had a webapp but since its not too difficult, I hope they might have deploy one in future. 1 week in Update (Downgraded to 1 star): They don't have a web app, they can't keep the mobile app working. Worst they don't have a decency to notify users of ongoing downtime. For last 48 hours the app shows "live view" but does not records or show any recorded or detected activity. I unplugged and replugged and received zero notifications. This isn't an acceptable behaviour for a "security" company. Other than watching your pets there is no point in buying this.
customer_reviews.author: UGH

customer_reviews.title: Having the best "free account" features without needing a subscription was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently checked my video feed and noticed the features were severely downgraded. Videos are cut off and you can't watch more than a few seconds. Did a bit more research online and found out they significantly downgraded the free account to push people into the monthly subscription. Having the best "free account" features without needing a subscription was the entire reason I bought your (higher priced) device in the first place! If you're going to nerf your free accounts so much, you could have at least grandfathered in your old users. Way to bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Paranda

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well. I have no issues with it at the moment! You can manipulate the camera view by turning it a couple degrees to the left a couple degrees to the right. I don’t like that you can’t mount it because it’s too heavy but for the value in price I would say it’s well worth it! FYI, there are some features that you need to purchase a Canary sub for like accessing your old videos events from 2 days ago, and to use the 2 way communication. It’s a little glitchy the 2-way communication, IT TAKES A LITTLE PRACTICE TO MASTER IT! You have to get use to the 3-5 second delay when speaking!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Provides ZERO Quantitative Info on Air Quality
customer_reviews.text: The company refused to provide ANY numerical information whatsoever regarding air quality measurements. They will only provide the insulting: Normal & Abnormal, rather than sharing the underlying numbers used to oversimplify the air quality readings. What exactly is normal ? This is especially important, since the unit calibrates itself to your air quality, without providing any specific information about the air you are breathing. So, if the unit is calibrated in a dirty air environment, will it thereafter tell you that your dirty air is normal? And how bad is my abnormal air using the PM2.5 standard. DON'T WORRY YOUR PRETTY LITTLE HEAD OVER IT, INSULTINGLY IMPLIES THE COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned_Citizen

customer_reviews.title: No uninterrupted live stream??!
customer_reviews.text: This has potential, but doesn't live up to the promise. The live feed kept dropping (a couple times a minute or more) despite a strong wifi signal (yes, I ran speed tests). When I called customer service, a rep told me that this was normal and that the canary doesn't actually provide uninterrupted, live streaming. What?? I recently bought a nest cam as replacement and it works perfectly. Worth the extra $50 by far.
customer_reviews.author: Decloud

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Forced subscription after purchase. Useless without a membership now. Will not record when someone is home even at night without subscription. Geofencing is wildly inaccurate and usually believes we are home for hours after we left.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea if I like my Canary
customer_reviews.text: First of all I dont have a problem with the seller. I received my Canary quickly. So I am giving this review three stars. I have no idea if I like my Canary. It does not work. Completely dead. After two weeks with Canary support, I was told to return the Canary. Which I can't because I did not even try this until recently. So I blame myself. Check your Canary's when you get them to see if they work... I didn't until months later. Dont make the same mistake... As of now, Canary will replace my defective Canary. I am grateful. I still recommend that you try yours when you receive it....
customer_reviews.author: Bessie Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy and great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handy and great. The alarm is pretty loud, great video and I love the easy to use features and app. Super easy set up and now I feel secure leaving the house.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaS

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition,  outdoor capable
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these now and they all work very well. This particular one sits outside of my window overlooking my driveway. Surprisingly it has held up against the elements of wind rain and even snow, although I don’t think is meant for outdoor. Great for security and will notify you for any motion.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Canary let me down
customer_reviews.text: I have been having nothing but problems with this product for about a week. The units I have 3 of these units in my home all in ones. I bought these. Units so could help monitor my wife who has cancer while I step outside or while I stepped out to pick up items. I have contacted canary and they said they fixed the problem but have not for me. The unit stays on and records in the home mode not just away mode. Very frustrating. I am cancelling my premium plan with them and try to find another system.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Great value for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: The canary is a great value. I get email notification when anyone enters our condo. Pretty good images. So far just confirming authorized people but reassuring to have when we are not there. Perhaps even better, it monitors air quality and temperature so we would know if our AC goes out in hot humid Florida summers and we could contact the property manager right away before mold sets in. The negative aspect is that when the electricity goes out, or WiFi is off, it doesn’t work at all. However after hurricane Irma it came back on as soon as electricity was restored.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysi12

customer_reviews.title: What a total ripoff. This shouldn’t be legal.
customer_reviews.text: Canary has removed essential features like “night mode” - the reason for buying the device - and put it behind a paywall. Without telling me! Oh and they upped the cost while doing so. And when I complained they immediately fence with their ToS. Since software and hardware features are so integrated this shouldn’t be allowed. I got a $199 brick now. I want compensation. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Whatever

customer_reviews.title: Eyes in the back of my head!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Canaries! They keep an eye on my home and my puppies when I’m out so if there is activity anywhere I get a notification and can instantly check what is happening. If the puppies are restless (or having an argument) I can talk directly to them which calms them down. I can’t imagine life without these invaluable security cameras. If anyone enters my home who shouldn’t, I have the option of sounding the alarm and calling for help, right there on my app. It is an anxiety preventative, a useful spy and it’s so inconspicuous that no-one ever notices it’s there. The perfect watch dog. Get one, or three, you will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The camera never worked properly. There was a firmware update that bricked the camera. Canary customer service was not helpful and just told me to wait it out and it will resolve itself. After 3 days of having a $200 paperweight I am returning the camera and going with a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Raab

customer_reviews.title: Location, location, location
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but am frustrated that the system cannot reliably determine my location. My phone has no problem but there is a disconnect in the way Canary interprets it. I have tried to work with support on various occasions until I stop getting responses. Wish they could work out the bugs. I have had the system for a year and it seemed to work better until they updated their software. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: TWH

customer_reviews.title: Great device, great price
customer_reviews.text: It’s an excellent camera. And you don’t need the subscription for it to work. It’s very reliable and the video quality is great for Indoors. It also includes a great feature... it measures the air quality and temperature and it will alert you if the levels are abnormal.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Arismendy

customer_reviews.title: I have to spend time to return for another which takes away from what is normally a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Missing the USB and setup cable so it’s worthless. I have to spend time to return for another which takes away from what is normally a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Recommended: Smart, simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I own two Canaries, and I'm a big fan. They are simple, smart and just work. The video and audio are both very good, and the setup is fast. Have had a few minor issues, but the team is very receptive to suggestions about how to fix things. Specifically, you need a strong wireless connection and you need to be sure that Canary isn't filtered by any firewall issues. I looked at Nest Cam and all the usual suspects before buying this. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Benzedrine

customer_reviews.title: Videos are clear and sound is good. I have not had the problems with false ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first security camera. After reading reviews I decided to try Canary. So far I have been impressed with the unit. Videos are clear and sound is good. I have not had the problems with false alarms but we do not have pets. My only issue is the alert tone on my iPhone. It is too short and not a tone I can hear very well. I suggest Canary do something to allow different alert tones on iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: David Conway

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the ability to view remotely what may be happening at home while traveling. Clear view and can zoom in also. Well worth the price for the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Davidicus

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality & customer support!
customer_reviews.text: First unit arrived with defective power connector, but at least they did replace on a timely basis. 2nd unit worked for 1 season (4 months in a seasonal residence), but all attempts to get it functioning thereafter failed! Customer support failed to accept the product was defective even after my completing all tests they offered! 2 other cameras worked great while the Canary failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Received a re-certified product with 90-day limited warranty instead of new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from the seller "iHeaven". The order on my account clearly shows it was supposed to be a NEW item with a 1-year warranty. Instead when I opened the box there was a sticker that said Canary re-certified. Upon closer examination, it also says "90-day limited warranty" on a sticker on the outside, covering up the normal 1-year warranty text. DO NOT ORDER this product FROM THE "iHeaven" SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Forced membership
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and the functionality and recordings while not perfect, was a good deal with the free video cloud storage. Every feature that was free has now been turned off. The only way to get those features back is to buy a $9.99 a month membership. Shame on you Canary. You blew it, and pissed off a lot of customers. I do not recommend this to anyone looking for a home security camera. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: [chuckles]

customer_reviews.title: Mixed assessment
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these units. Set up is relatively easy. Software integration on my phone was relatively easy. The motion detection is exceptional. The night vision is average the picture quality is average with night vision. I had one unit to quit working completely and one that is working flawlessly. I’m going to see how good the warranty on the device is!! The subscription service is a little pricey and I opted not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last...
customer_reviews.text: I had it for less than a year before it broke. It would start to malfunction so I would unplug it and allow it to reset. Eventually it just stopped working. The light in it went dead and that was the end of it. The concept of how it works is sound. It is just not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: TruckerWoman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture and video only downfall it’s not wireless like our Arlo Cameras. I pay for premium is worth it if you have traffic in and out for motion sensors and notifications to phone, and video recording.
customer_reviews.author: David Herrera

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE SCAM - BAIT AND SWITCH FRAUD ***DO NOT BUY!***
customer_reviews.text: I bought a canary in 2015 and while it had many issues, it did what it claimed to. I've found today that I CAN NO LONGER SEE MORE THAN TEN SECONDS OF ANYTHING IT RECORDS. I thought this was a technical error but I found out that CANARY HAS STARTED CHARGING $10 A MONTH FOR YOU TO SEE YOUR OWN VIDEOS. This was NOT the case when I purchased the product, nor was it ever communicated - they have scaled back their free features. I am in complete disbelief, this has to be against the law. AVOID AT ALL COSTS - THIS PRODUCT IS A SCAM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expect to pay a lot for basic features you think are included.
customer_reviews.text: They have taken away all of the features that used to be included and now charge a monthly fee for them. Expect to be bait-and-switched into a monthly fee for the device to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: noob

customer_reviews.title: Great Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a high rise. My only concern is if maintenance comes in to do any work. This is an awesome camera, notifies my phone if someone comes by and I did sign up for the service and is worth every penny. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: works great for me
customer_reviews.text: works great for me .....I travel a lot ,and love to know who's going in and out of my house ,such as the pet-sitter ...the audio is very clear ,just a great security device...
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the apartment dweller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the apartment dweller! It sends real-time alerts to my phone when there is activity when I am away. It is usually the cat, but when the maintenance folks come around, I can see them and everything they do while they are in my home. I hope I'll never need it for anything else, but should anyone break in, I know I will have the whole thing recorded
customer_reviews.author: deborah Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was really good when I bought it. Now is just a piece of junk since it doesn't record anything unless you pay for membership.
customer_reviews.author: homemadehome

customer_reviews.title: Worse is the customer support
customer_reviews.text: I have the canary for less than 2 weeks and it stopped working: software issue causes it to get stuck in boot mode. Worse is the customer support. They are slow to respond and difficult to reach. Mainly auto email response. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing unit and I purchased 3 in the last year
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!! CUSTOMER SERVICE DISCONTINUED AS WELL AS TAPING TIME. This was an amazing unit and I purchased 3 in the last year. It is now useless unless you buy a per month plan. It well only tape 3 seconds of an alert. They have reduced all of the benefits of having them to practically nothing. You would be better off buying a cheap security sticker and posting it in your window. Such a shame. They should be ashamed of themselves. They have also cut live customer service calls so if you are using them to monitor the elderly or children, they might not still be around by the time they email you back. Total bait and switch scheme!!
customer_reviews.author: MR DARAC

customer_reviews.title: You sang like a bird
customer_reviews.text: Our Canary rocks! We spent the week away on a cruise, confident that our home was secure. More than that, our 18 year old son skipped school one day AND had friends over! Guess how we found out? Thank you, Canary! You sang like a bird. Also, we were comparing our app with a different (cheaper) brand that my brother-in-law purchased and it didn’t have nearly as many features as our Canary.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Medvedz

customer_reviews.title: Very good in the beginning... then issues arise
customer_reviews.text: Canary worked fine for a bit, now it takes forever to show my live feed, never gives me a tempature update, lets me know of movement in my house 15-20 min later than it actually happened, and to top it off always loses connection. It’s very good in the beginning but after it just becomes terrible
customer_reviews.author: alex herrera

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for over a year the company took away all the free features that were the reasons that I choose this product. The labeling on the box and description of this device is no long how it works. You have to pay monthly to use it now.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingFistsOfFluff

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I would not be surprised to see a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bait and switch. The company makes you pay for all recording now. Very disappointed. I would not be surprised to see a class action lawsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great system with one bug so far
customer_reviews.text: Great overall system . Occasionally one camera will go offline when trying to live view for extended periods of time. Not sure why that is , and it’s kind of annoying. All my cameras are hard wired through gigabit lan to router. Other than that issue I do like the system overall. Also the improvements keep coming over time which is great
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: 2 our of 3 didn’t work and had to be returned. Terrible technical support for set up issues.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of them. One worked two never worked. They didn’t connnect with the network and couldn’t be installed. Wasted five hours trying to set up the two. No technical support available. On line help useless. Tried contacting Canary service but they were not available on a business day. Finally gave up and am returning the two that don’t work. Very dissatisfied with product and service.
customer_reviews.author: John F Rao

customer_reviews.title: I think this product works just as I expected! ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works just as I expected! A agree with other reviews about the intuitive notifications but other than that I have had no problems whatsoever with it being offline. I had some issues initially with it not recognizing my husband's phone but their customer service was very helpful and we got that worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Valeri

customer_reviews.title: I love the home and away features and the configurable alerts ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I have an HOA that enters claiming necessity falsely. I have one at the front door, in the main area and in my back hallway. I love the home and away features and the configurable alerts as well. I wish they could be mounted and could have a rechargeable battery but still much more cost efficient than an alarm system and with recorded video possible. I installed one in my parents' condo as well for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: TMS78

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good if you want all the features you got to buy a subscription for 10 dollars a month but it's a good little machine
customer_reviews.author: Danny Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Security and then some!!
customer_reviews.text: I used it at my cabin and I am very happy with it. Recently had multiple visits from a family of bears. Without the Canary cameras, I never would have known. Their customer service is good as well!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: watchful eye
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it tracks movement when someone passes by Also if the owner dressed up it will not recognize you it has good facial recognition software.
customer_reviews.author: peyton whiteford

customer_reviews.title: Happy Canary user
customer_reviews.text: The setup instructions needs work as pressing the button does not always work for linking the device to the app. Using the cable works much better, but you need a headphone jack on your mobile device. The camera works great and the alerts are accurate. It tells us when someone is at the door when they shouldn't be.
customer_reviews.author: Yung Chang

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!! You can not use half the features unless you pay ten bucks a month. Then they keep billing you the ten dollars even after you cancel the membership. Called help line is a redirect over and over. Canary is a crook!!
customer_reviews.author: Mikewyc67

customer_reviews.title: a non dependable video is worse then having no video
customer_reviews.text: They keep modifying this, changing the software, cutting down time of the video capture for the free version. I DO NOT recommend this. On top of all the other issues, it locks up, will not display video. I have even gone as far as connected it via a wired connection to try and improve connectivity. a non dependable video is worse then having no video, it gives yo a false sense of security
customer_reviews.author: Charlieios

customer_reviews.title: Canary Cam no longer useful without paid membership.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first smart security camera that I purchased and was really impressed with the functionality. I did not mind spending the $185 at the time because I was getting a solid camera that did not require a monthly fee for the needed functionality. Recently Canary changed the terms of their service, requiring users to "upgrade" to a paid plan to receive most of the functionality they were getting for free. These changes have effectively neutered the cameras as security devices. I don't mind paying for a service ( I pay for the recording option for my Ring Doorbell) but I don't like having the terms changed on me after the fact. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great security and convenience !
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Canary for basic home security but it has been so much more. We can check on the dogs when we’re away and also look to see if the house is clear when I come home late. We recently had people working in our house when we were gone and the Canary told use when they left—which was great because they left the garage open. I was able to close it from my phone with the Chamberlain MyQ. I hate to think what could have happened if the house was left open overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rattermann

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two devices because the free services served my needs. They started removing features, trying to force users on to the membership plan. The cost of membership (per device) is just ridiculous. There are so many other products out there to choose from. Go with more reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Company does not respond to problems or questions
customer_reviews.text: Thg e software is terrible and it seems impossible to contact this company. Avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Canary... works for me
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for inside... it looks great and does exactly what i bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Canary hates their customers
customer_reviews.text: Really really ticked off. All the features we came to love including the Night mode, video recording, and two way chat - things we chose the Canary over the competition for, have been yanked away from us and now they are forcing us to buy their expensive subscription plan! A total bait and switch! Stay away - who knows what they’ll start charging us next for. Lesson learned - stay with a company that has been in the business longer and actually values their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Sere

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our home’s security.
customer_reviews.text: We love our Canary. It consistently works exactly as expected. It’s everything we need for home security.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Busted !!!!!  More ways to use your Canary
customer_reviews.text: I give the Canary 5 stars because it does exactly what it is supposed to do, with style. I have not experienced any of the problems discussed in the other reviews. Each update adds items that only make it a better camera. This camera is built solid, not cheap plastic like others, the craftsmanship, design and feel is comparable to that of Apple products. I have also used this camera for other uses, inspecting wall cavities, underneath the house, and last but not least capturing the entry point for unwanted visitors (check out the attached picture). This camera just keeps getting better and better.
customer_reviews.author: James A Hurst

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: I had been somewhat happy with Canary. However, their recent decision to eliminate video recall and offering 24 hours of storage is a significant hit to their competitive advantage. I am assuming they were hoping for a higher monthly subscription conversion rate, but this decision will probably be the being of the end for the company. The user base is revolting and negative reviews will continue to impact future customers acquisitions. Ring seems to offer a better product with cheaper operating costs.
customer_reviews.author: RaceFan112

customer_reviews.title: We have three and love them.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had one that monitors our vacation home for a couple years and recently decided to place two in our main home. We needed to monitor both activity and temperature, so the Canary was ideal and the price is amazing. Set up only takes a few minutes, video and audio quality is impressive, and membership is optional. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Does have air quality sensors that are great. Not good as security for us though
customer_reviews.text: We have to be standing in front of the unit before it detects anyone. Does have air quality sensors that are great. Not good as security for us though.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and use. Definitely detects motion. Fast accessibility and let's you see instantly what is happening in your home.
customer_reviews.author: FitPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Quality Camera
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, wide angle, clear night vision, clear sound, the setup is so easy, good looking and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: All or nothing

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect system
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Motion detection sometimes fails to capture consecutive events happening within in a short span.
customer_reviews.author: Holborner

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't work very well. Fails to detect ...
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't work very well. Fails to detect when you're home, so you're constantly getting notifications. Also, changes in lighting or switching to and from night vision trigger spurious notifications. I just don't want to check whether there is a burglar in my house 10 times a day!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with quality and ease of setup. Picture quality is great and even in the dark. Sound quality is ok, and the speaker on it is average. App is really easy to use. Overall would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy, years of reliability
customer_reviews.text: Just absolute thrilto use. It’s easy to setup. Easy to use. I recommended it to many friends so far.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Works flawless
customer_reviews.text: Owned one and bought a second one for another location. Easy setup and works perfect. Can check home anytime I want and alerts are excellent. Very pleased with Canary and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Handman

customer_reviews.title: Works well - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Canary's and they do a very good job of monitoring my house. The geofencing works flawlessly. Initially I got a number of alerts that were false due to pet activity but I was able to dial in on setting that ignored them fairly quickly. I nearly never get a buzz anymore and I feel like my home is protected thanks to the combination of Canary, Galaxy S7 Edge and Pebble Time watch. The addition of tracking environmental data was an unexpected plus.
customer_reviews.author: Shang Petro and Trin Lea

customer_reviews.title: Canary, my goto home monitoring smart companion!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought hundreds of items online, but never written a review. The Canary all in security system is incredible wonderful!!! Safety is one of my major concerns and Canary offers piece of mind like no other smart home product I’ve bought. I plan to upload videos to share how Canary is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: I love my Canary
customer_reviews.text: I love my Canary, I always have an eye on my place no matter where I am. It is easy to set up and you get notifications straight from the app when there is activity. As far as security devices, this seems to be the best bang for your buck. Their customer service is pretty responsive. Make sure you get familiar with the app when you set it up so it meets your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A product that does what it says what it will do !
customer_reviews.text: Great product and simple in its design and application. Was easy to set up. Canary meets my home needs to a tee. My only disappointment is the products' lack of a way to secure the camera to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Binus

customer_reviews.title: It really makes one feel in control.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little time using it to get totally familiarized with its geatures. However, it’s the beat system I have seen by far. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Choose another product...
customer_reviews.text: After researching cameras, I went with the Canary for the ability to record in the Home status so we can keep an eye on an elderly parent. Now the company has opted to disable recording in Home unless you pay for their membership. Suddenly, I can only use this to watch live feeds which is useless if something happens. I'm so disappointed in this company and would never purchase anything from them again. I would recommend that anyone looking for a camera look into other options.
customer_reviews.author: Ali C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good resolution of the picture. Relatively easy to set up. I really hope it is never needed for a break in, but I'm confident it will capture the image if it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G. Fouch

customer_reviews.title: If you have stuff you care about, invest in this.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Got a lot of peace of mind being away for work. Definitely recommend for city living
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: It allows me to see my life and Maxi the pug's life go by.WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.author: JOEY G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it after sensitivity control added
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Canary for many months and at first I was disappointed with their alarm notification as it would always send me a notification when ever my dog moved in the living room where I had my Canary. I kept requesting that then needed a sensitivity control and a few weeks ago they finally had one after an update. Now I love my Canary. The high definition video is really nice. I love the fact that it automatically goes into alarm mode when my wife and myself are both gone due to both of our iPhones being out of the area of the Canary.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. J.

customer_reviews.title: I like the Canary and have used them at home and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the Canary and have used them at home and in the office. Very crisp video and the geo-location is pretty nice when you are coming and going. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SL

product_meta.title: CANARY: All-in-One Indoor 1080p HD Security Camera with Built-in Siren and Climate Monitor | App Phone Motion / Person / Air Quality Alerts | Works with Alexa & Insurance Discount Eligible - White
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:Single| Style:CanaryHome security made easy. Protect your home with Canary's 90+ dB siren, motion-activated recording, auto-arm/disarm, and automatic connection to your local authorities. Stream real-time video of your home with Canary's 1080p HD camera, 147-degree wide-angle lens, night vision, and high-quality audio. Monitor air quality, temperature, and humidity to help understand how your home might be affecting your health. Receive instant video alerts on your iOS or Android device and respond to incidents before they turn into emergencies. Simply place Canary on a shelf or table, plug it in, connect to the internet, and you're ready to go! Each product comes ready to go right out of the box and also includes free cloud storage for recent events. Secure your house with a simple touch from your smartphone. With Canary, you have all the information you need to choose the right response, whether it's calling the authorities or sounding the alarm. Secure your house with ease.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately). Connectivity: 2.4GHz Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n),wired ethernet, bluetooth low energy (BLE)

LET CANARY BE YOUR EYES AND EARS: The Canary All-in-One Home Security System is just what you've been looking for. Featuring a full HD 1080p camera with a 147-degree lens view, the Canary can see more or your home to help keep your mind at ease. The Canary also features high-quality sound recording, so you are not only able to see your home, but be able to hear what's going on.

BUILT IN ALARM TO HELP SCARE OFF INTRUDERS: The Canary features a built in alarm system that reaches sound levels of 90+ decibels, that's the same noise level as a running lawn mower! The built in siren is perfect for scaring off unwanted visitors.

GET UPDATES TO YOUR SMARTPHONE: Canary works using the wireless internet in your home. By connecting your phone to the Canary system, you will be able to receive immediate alerts when your camera notices movement and activity. Never be surprised by an unfortunate event with the Canary Home Security System.

PERFECT FOR PET LOVERS: The Canary Home Security System is also a great tool for pet parents. Have you ever wondered what your cats do while you're away, or which of you dogs keeps getting into the trash? Well, now you can watch and find out. Set up your Canary camera near where your pet spends the most time and be able to keep an eye on them throughout the day.

WE'RE ON A MISSION: Everyone has a right to feel safe and secure, and security comes from having the information you want when you want it. It’s the guiding principle behind our work and reinforces our belief that the best technology helps to make you smarter, puts you in control, and gives you access to the information you need. That’s why Canary is dedicated to developing easy-to-use technology that protects, empowers, and has a meaningful impact on people, families, and their communities.
